amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt civil actions alleging fraud.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 115-29 to exempt civil actions alleging fraud.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 230 (Roll no. 143).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 230 (Roll no. 143).
